short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays local time in PST, CST, and MST.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays local time in PST, CST and MST. Useful while scheduling meetings with customers across multiple timezones. It also allows you to enter time and converts that into the multiple timezones.
